Emilie Agreste (mother) | nationality = French | lbl21 = Hometown | data21 = [[Paris]] | lbl22 = Ability | data22 = Destruction | lbl23 = Weapon | data23 = Extendable staff }} '''Adrien Agreste''' is a [[fictional character]] and the male [[protagonist]] of the animated television series ''[[Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir]]'' created by Thomas Astruc. He is portrayed as a French teenage student who has been homeschooled for most of his life and is also a model for his father, [[List of Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir characters#Gabriel Agreste|Gabriel Agreste]], a famous [[fashion designer]] with whom Adrien has a distant relationship. After passing the test of [[List of Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir characters#Master Fu|Master Fu]], who is later revealed as the keeper of the magic objects called Miraculouses, by helping him, Adrien is chosen as one of the two soon-to-be [[superhero]]es alongside [[Ladybug (Miraculous)|Ladybug]] and receives a ring named the Cat Miraculous that, when worn, grants him the ability to transform into his superhero alias, '''Cat Noir''' ({{lang-fr|text=Chat Noir|translation=Black Cat|links=no}}). Every Miraculous is accompanied by a small magical creature known as a kwami, with Adrien's kwami being [[List of Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir characters#Plagg|Plagg]], a black cat-like being. As Cat Noir, Adrien's signature ability is destruction. Adrien appears in most ''Miraculous'' media, including the main series, the comic books, and the official mobile game. Adrien was conceptualized as a character that would appeal to everyone, having many good characteristics and being able to inspire the viewers. Regarding Adrien's superhero identity, since Ladybug's power was connected to good luck, Astruc concluded that her partner would have powers related to bad luck, which resulted in him thinking of a black cat. Cat Noir was also inspired by the comic book superhero [[Catwoman]]. Adrien is [[Voice acting|voiced]] by [[Bryce Papenbrook]] in the English [[Dubbing (filmmaking)|dub]], while Benjamin Bollen voices him in the show's French version. Critical reception of Adrien has been generally positive, with writers describing him as a great, interesting, and relatable character. His relationship with [[Marinette Dupain-Cheng]] has been praised, both when they are depicted as civilians and as superheroes. Adrien has served as inspiration for [[cosplay]]s. Merchandise inspired by him has been produced, such as action figures, accessories, and clothing items. ==Development== ==={{anchor|Conception and creation}}Concept and creation=== [[File:Adrien_Agreste_as_Cat_Noir.png|thumb|left|upright=0.85|Adrien Agreste under his [[superhero]] identity, Cat Noir. His creation was based on a black cat since Thomas Astruc decided that Cat Noir would be connected to bad luck. Adrien's superhero form was also inspired by [[Catwoman]].|alt=The appearance of Adrien Agreste's superhero form]] Adrien Agreste was conceptualized as a "modern" [[Prince Charming]],{{cite web|url=https://www.bsckids.com/2015/12/countdown-to-miraculous-is-on/|title=Countdown to Miraculous Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir Is On|date=December 4, 2015|last=Anders|first=Ella|work=BSCkids|access-date=October 30, 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20181026093121/https://www.bsckids.com/2015/12/countdown-to-miraculous-is-on/|archive-date=October 26, 2018|dead-url=no|df=mdy-all}} "with many good human qualities" and a "feminine part";{{cite web|url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_VhFsvdargs|title=Interview - Thomas Astruc - DoKomi 2016|date=January 18, 2017|work=DoKomi|publisher=[[YouTube]]|access-date=October 30, 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20181114191645/https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_VhFsvdargs|archive-date=November 14, 2018|dead-url=no|df=mdy-all}} Thomas Astruc, the creator of the animated television series ''[[Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir]]'', described these characteristics as a "perfect combo", adding that Adrien is "a really nice character". He also characterized Adrien as "handsome, smart, brave, but also very sensitive", as well as someone that "everybody would naturally fall in love with". When asked how Adrien and [[Marinette Dupain-Cheng]] had been developed, Astruc commented that he had wanted to "present sunny characters who could inspire people all around the world in this new century". Astruc stated that since ladybugs are associated with good luck, he had decided that [[Ladybug (Miraculous)|Ladybug]]'s partner would have powers connected to bad luck, and as a result he had thought of a black cat.{{cite web|url=http://tvmag.lefigaro.fr/programme-tv/article/television/91726/miraculous-le-createur-de-ladybug-devoile-les-secrets-de-sa-serie-a-succes-.html|title=Miraculous : le créateur de Ladybug dévoile les secrets de sa série à succès|date=March 16, 2016|last=Mercereau|first=Damien|newspaper=[[Le Figaro]]|access-date=October 30, 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20181026094044/http://tvmag.lefigaro.fr/programme-tv/article/television/91726/miraculous-le-createur-de-ladybug-devoile-les-secrets-de-sa-serie-a-succes-.html|archive-date=October 26, 2018|dead-url=no|language=French|trans-title=Miraculous : the creator of Ladybug reveals the secrets of his successful series|df=mdy-all}}{{cite web|url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VrSLlWH9uuY|title=101 PUR 100 #23 Thomas Astruc & Wilfried Pain (Miraculous Ladybug)|date=March 8, 2016|work=[[Nolife (TV channel)|Nolife]]|publisher=[[YouTube]]|access-date=October 30, 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20181114192531/https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VrSLlWH9uuY|archive-date=November 14, 2018|dead-url=no|language=French|df=mdy-all}} The creation of Cat Noir ({{lang-fr|text=Chat Noir|translation=Black Cat|links=no}}) was also a tribute to [[Catwoman]]. Astruc commented that Cat Noir's civilian identity had initially been a character named Félix, describing him as "an early love interest for Marinette" who would have had a distant attitude toward her and would have been included in the "typical cold-and-snobbish-guy anime trope". He said that while the difference between Félix and Cat Noir's personalities would have worked positively, it would not have provided very good narratives in the long term. Due to this, Félix was replaced with Adrien.{{cite web|url=http://movieforkids.bestmovie.it/news/miraculous-ladybug-anime-la-versione-della-serie-tv-che-non-vedremo-mai/54117/|title=Miraculous Ladybug anime, la versione della serie tv che non vedremo mai|date=December 10, 2017|last=Rosignoli|first=Irene|work=Movie for Kids|access-date=November 5, 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20181105142730/http://movieforkids.bestmovie.it/news/miraculous-ladybug-anime-la-versione-della-serie-tv-che-non-vedremo-mai/54117/|archive-date=November 5, 2018|dead-url=no|language=Italian|trans-title=Miraculous Ladybug anime, the version of the TV series that we will never see|df=mdy-all}}{{cite web|url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2016-01-10/zag-ceo-miraculous-ladybug-has-2d-original-animation-video-in-development/.97430|title=Zag CEO: Miraculous Ladybug Has 2D Original Animation Video in Development|date=January 10, 2016|last=Pineda|first=Rafael Antonio|work=[[Anime News Network]]|access-date=October 30, 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20181029153150/https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2016-01-10/zag-ceo-miraculous-ladybug-has-2d-original-animation-video-in-development/.97430|archive-date=October 29, 2018|dead-url=no|df=mdy-all}} The idea related to the duo of the black cat and the ladybug was also inspired by one of Astruc's previous romantic relationships.{{cite web|url=http://tvmag.lefigaro.fr/programme-tv/article/television/89236/miraculous-va-enchanter-tfou%C2%A0-sur-tf1.html|title=Miraculous va enchanter TFou ! sur TF1|date=October 18, 2015|last=Gascoin|first=Patrice|newspaper=[[Le Figaro]]|access-date=October 30, 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20181026094445/http://tvmag.lefigaro.fr/programme-tv/article/television/89236/miraculous-va-enchanter-tfou%C2%A0-sur-tf1.html|archive-date=October 26, 2018|dead-url=no|language=French|trans-title=Miraculous will delight TFou ! on TF1|df=mdy-all}} Astruc said that managing the situation created by Cat Noir's two identities alongside Ladybug's two selves in terms of romance was "a lot of fun". He stated that pairs of [[superhero]]es like the one Cat Noir forms with Ladybug are rare in television series, adding that people enjoy the love game between the two characters.{{cite web|url=http://tvmag.lefigaro.fr/programme-tv/thomas-astruc-avec-miraculous-nous-savons-ou-nous-voulons-aller-_351d4a80-b341-11e7-8aca-c6cafecb3960/|title=Thomas Astruc : «Avec Miraculous, nous savons où nous voulons aller»|date=October 27, 2017|last=Mercereau|first=Damien|newspaper=[[Le Figaro]]|access-date=October 30, 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20181026092042/http://tvmag.lefigaro.fr/programme-tv/thomas-astruc-avec-miraculous-nous-savons-ou-nous-voulons-aller-_351d4a80-b341-11e7-8aca-c6cafecb3960/|archive-date=October 26, 2018|dead-url=no|language=French|trans-title=Thomas Astruc: "With Miraculous, we know where we want to go"|df=mdy-all}} Cat Noir's [[Chibi (slang)|chibi]] form appearing in the series [[List of Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir episodes#Miraculous Zag Chibi|''Miraculous Chibi'']] was created by character designer Angie Nasca while the show "was still in the development phase";{{cite web|url=http://www.animationmagazine.net/animated-people/angie-nasca-designs-bite-size-zag-heroez-for-miraculous-chibi/|title=Angie Nasca Designs Bite-Size ZAG Heroez for 'Miraculous Chibi'|date=November 16, 2018|last=Milligan|first=Mercedes|magazine=[[Animation Magazine]]|access-date=November 21, 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20181121204430/http://www.animationmagazine.net/animated-people/angie-nasca-designs-bite-size-zag-heroez-for-miraculous-chibi/|archive-date=November 21, 2018|dead-url=no|df=mdy-all}} according to Nasca, "the series grew from those initial sketches" portraying the two lead characters. [[Jeremy Zag]], the producer of ''Miraculous'', stated that the love situation Adrien created alongside Marinette, their superhero [[alter ego]]s, and their secrets are some of the main parts of the show.{{cite web|url=https://www.telez.fr/actus-tv/miraculous-les-aventures-de-ladybug-et-chat-noir-bientot-un-film-une-serie-en-live-action-et-une-comedie-musicale/|title=Miraculous, les aventures de Ladybug et Chat noir : bientôt un film, une série en live action et une comédie musicale|date=April 5, 2018|last=Charlet|first=Justine|work=TéléZ|access-date=October 30, 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20181029180135/https://www.telez.fr/actus-tv/miraculous-les-aventures-de-ladybug-et-chat-noir-bientot-un-film-une-serie-en-live-action-et-une-comedie-musicale/|archive-date=October 29, 2018|dead-url=no|language=French|trans-title=Miraculous, the adventures of Ladybug and Chat Noir : soon a film, a live action series and a musical|df=mdy-all}} Sébastien Thibaudeau, the writing director of ''Miraculous'', mentioned that Adrien frequently makes him emotional due to his difficult life.{{cite web|url=http://www.onirik.net/Conference-avec-les-scenaristes-de|title=Conférence avec les scénaristes de Miraculous, les aventures de Ladybug et Chat Noir|date=June 30, 2019|work=Onirik|access-date=July 13, 2019|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20190713001106/http://www.onirik.net/Conference-avec-les-scenaristes-de|archive-date=July 13, 2019|dead-url=no|language=French|trans-title=Conference with the writers of Miraculous, the adventures of Ladybug and Chat Noir|df=mdy-all}} He said Cat Noir is the character that brings humor into the story, contrasting with Ladybug, who is more serious. Thibaudeau stated that Adrien can express himself when he is transformed into Cat Noir.{{cite web|url=https://www.lalibre.be/culture/medias-tele/avec-lady-bug-les-filles-prennent-le-pouvoir-59e8adb1cd7095e2f70481fe|title=Avec "Lady Bug", les filles prennent le pouvoir|date=October 22, 2017|last=Gourdin|first=Caroline|newspaper=[[La Libre Belgique]]|access-date=July 15, 2019|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20190715000419/https://www.lalibre.be/culture/medias-tele/avec-lady-bug-les-filles-prennent-le-pouvoir-59e8adb1cd7095e2f70481fe|archive-date=July 15, 2019|dead-url=no|language=French|trans-title=With "Lady Bug", girls take power|df=mdy-all}} Fred Lenoir, a writer of the series, commented that Adrien's relationship with Marinette, depicted as both civilians and superheroes, and the misunderstanding resulted from it represent the central part of the story.
